name: Clever Girl
text:
Hungry for big wins.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: Feathermoon
text: "The thrill of the hunt...There's nothing like it." Earnable after purchasing the The Lost City of Un'Goro Tavern Pass.

name: Aegwynn
text:
The Guardian of Tirisfal expects great things from you. Go impress her.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures alongside the Aegwynn Hero Skin.

name: Sanctuary
text:
Become immortal.

Acquired by participating in an online promotion.

name: Gardens of the Lost City
text:
The City's got some great restaurants, but the service is really slow.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, August 2025.

name: The Lost City
text: Things of true value are rarely found with ease. Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Year of the Pegasus
text:
Fly high!

Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, September 2025.

name: Dirdra
text:
Take the fight straight to the enemy.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Faerin
text:
A Lamplighter brings hope.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: Cultist
text:
Sure, the Cult of the Damned's schemes don't have a great track record. But THIS time...

Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, October 2025.

name: Rebirth Celebration
text:
From ashes we rise, and the shells we break â€“ we honor our journey and the joy of life anew.

Obtained by participating in a special event.
